Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskman.backend.project.Project
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectWrapper

    public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProjectWrapper
    This class represents a project.
    Author:
    Julien Benaouda, Jeroen Van Der Donckt

    • Constructor Detail

      • Project

        public Project(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.time.LocalDateTime creationTime,
               java.time.LocalDateTime dueTime,
               User user)
        Creates a new project with the given values.
        Parameters:
        name - the project name
        description - the project description
        creationTime - the creation time of the project. The creation time must be of the following format: dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm.
        dueTime - the due time of the project. The due time must be of the following format: dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm
        user - the current user
        Postcondition:
        a new project is created with the given attributes
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of the given parameters is not of a valid format. TODO: is dit nodig?
        OperationNotPermittedException - when the user doesn't have access to create a project

        public Task getTask(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:

      • createTask

        public void createTask(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       long estimatedDuration,
                       double acceptableDeviation,
                       User user)
        Create a new task with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the task.
        description - the description of the task
        estimatedDuration - the estimated duration of the task (in minutes)
        acceptableDeviation - the acceptable deviation of the task
        Postcondition:
        a new task is created and added to the project
        Throws:
        OperationNotPermittedException - when the user is not allowed to create tasks
